There is no way I would be where I am now without the (absurdly) hard work of the team behind @VAULTFestival, who are lovingly and supportively changing the face of British theatre, making it a kinder, more collaborative, welcoming, fun place to be. #LoveTheatreDay
I wouldn’t still be working if it weren’t for the incredible training from @USSU, @StoneCrabsTC, and @LAMDAdrama, and assisting opportunities from @sell_a_door and @LesEnfantsTerr. #LoveTheatreDay

I find #LoveTheatreDay particularly special as it was on this day 11 years ago that the first play I ever directed was performed. It’s been a long journey since that evening at @FrenshamHeights but I couldn’t imagine doing anything else.
